name: Apollo
location: Apollo is on the 1st floor, down the hall from the gym, behind the old production pit.

name: Galaxy
location: Galaxy is on the 1st floor, in the large room where the video team used to be, right across from the gym.

name: Gym
location: The gym is on the 1st floor, across from Galaxy, to the right side of the hall after entering the door by the elevators.

name: Spray Room
location: The spray room is on the 1st floor, in the northwest corner, near the old Production pit.

name: Albert II
location: Albert II is on the 2nd floor, just south of the Baltimore entrance, near the old Blacktop area.

name: Buzz Aldrin
location: Buzz Aldrin is on the 2nd floor, in the southwest corner, near the old Blacktop area.

name: Ellen Ochoa
location: Ellen Ochoa is on the 2nd floor, just north of the Baltimore entrance, near Crossroads.

name: Gus Grissom
location: Gus Grissom is on the 2nd floor, the large room on west side near the southwest corner, near the old Blacktop space.

name: Mark Kelly
location: Mark Kelly is on the 2nd floor, immediately north of the Baltimore entrance, near Crossroads.

name: Neil Armstrong
location: Neil Armstrong is on the 2nd floor, in the southeast corner, near the Account team.

name: Sally Ride
location: Sally Ride is on the 2nd floor, in the northeast corner of the east wing, by where Moonshot used to sit.

name: Han Solo
location: Han Solo is on the 2nd floor, in the southwest corner near the old Blacktop space.

name: Chewie
location: Chewie is on the 2nd floor, in the southwest corner near the old Blacktop space, right next to Han Solo (duh).

name: Laika
location: Laika is on the 2nd floor, the area with the large TV right across from the old Moonshot lab space.

name: Tsygan
location: Tsygan is on the 2nd floor, in the corridor to the Balitmore exit.

name: Dyzik
location: Dyzik is on the 2nd floor, in the corridor to the Balitmore exit.

name: The City Dump
location: The City Dump is on the 2nd floor, in the northwest corner, near the new 40Digits space.

name: The Stadium
location: The Stadium is on the 2nd floor, in the northwest corner, near the new 40Digits space.

name: The Court House
location: The Court House is on the 2nd floor, in the northwest corner, near the new 40Digits space.

name: The City Plaza
location: The City Plaza is on the 2nd floor, in the northwest corner, near the new 40Digits space.

name: Judy Jetson
location: Judy Jetson is on the 2nd floor, the third room east of the southwest corner, near the old Blacktop space.

name: Jane Jetson
location: Jane Jetson is on the 2nd floor, on the east side, near the Account team.

name: George Jetson
location: George Jetson is on the 2nd floor, on the east side, near the Account team.

name: Mortis
location: Mortis is on the 2nd floor, in the new 40Digits space.

name: Millennium Falcon
location: Millennium Falcon is on the 2nd floor, in the new 40Digits space.

name: Er'kit
location: Er'kit is on the 2nd floor, in the new 40Digits space.

name: Astro
location: Astro is on the 3rd floor, just east of the elevators, near Datum.

name: Eris
location: Eris is on the 3rd floor, right next to Astro, just east of the elevators, near Datum.

name: Jupiter
location: Jupiter is on the 3rd floor, just behind the top of the stairs coming up from the second floor.

name: Saturn
location: Saturn is on the 3rd floor, near the top of the stairs coming up from the second floor, near Social.

name: Mars
location: Mars is on the 3rd floor, in the Northeast corner of the east wing, near Social.

name: Mr. Spacely
location: Mr. Spacely is on the 3rd floor, on the far east wall, near Social.

name: Rosie
location: Rosie is on the 3rd floor, on the far east wall, near Social.

name: Earth
location: You're standing on it! ðŸ˜‰ Jk. Earth is on the 3rd floor, in the southeast corner.

name: Mercury
location: Mercury is on the 3rd floor, in the northwest corner.

name: Venus
location: Venus is on the 3rd floor, in the northwest corner.

name: Uranus
location: Uranus is on the 3rd floor, in the northwest corner.

name: Neptune
location: Neptunes is on the 3rd floor, in the southwest corner.

name: Sun
location: Sun is on the 3rd floor, just east of the elevator, between Eris and Jupiter.

name: Calvera
location: Calvera is the VR Space on the 3rd floor, right next to Moonshot.

name: Michael Bay
location: Michael Bay is one of the video team edit bays on the 3rd floor, right next to Moonshot.

name: Bay Romano
location: Bay Romano is one of the video team edit bay on the 3rd floor, right next to Production.

name: Rocket Fuel
location: Rocket Fuel is the kitchen on the West side of the 3rd floor.

name: Blue Lounge
location: The Blue Lounge is on the 4th floor, in the Northwest corner, right by Flight Deck.

name: Magenta Lounge
location: The Magenta Lounge is on the 4th floor, near the Southeast corner, right in front of you whenever you come up the stairs.

name: Green Lounge
location: The Green Lounge is the stage on the 4th floor, right in the middle.

name: Black Lounge
location: The Black Lounge is on the 4th floor, in the Southeast corner, right next to the Magenta Lounge.

name: Flight Deck
location: The Flight Deck is the board room on the 4th floor, just west of the top of the stairs / elevator.

name: Kitchen Table
location: The Kitchen Table is the long wooden table on the 4th floor.

name: Zen Rooms
location: The Zen Rooms are on the 4th floor, at the top of the stairs, with the red doors.
